content:
simplify this text: he Commonpoint Challenge is similar to a walkathon, but you get to choose your own challenge activity and complete it anywhere, any time between April 1 - April 21, 2023. 

100% of all proceeds will provide critical financial support for the programs and services that help our community. It is because of supporters like YOU that we can provide the food, mental health services, employment support, and so much more to our friends and neighbors.

Prizes for the top three fundraisers!
